addLoginNotificationDesc.message: The "Add Login Notification" automatically prompts you to save new logins to your vault whenever you log into them for the first time.

authenticatorAppDesc.description: 'Authy' and 'Google Authenticator' are product names and should not be translated.
authenticatorAppDesc.message: Use an authenticator app (such as Authy or Google Authenticator) to generate time-based verification codes.

autoFillInfo.message: В текущия подпрозорец няма записи, които да бъдат попълнени.

autofillError.message: Неуспешно автоматично попълване. Вместо това копирайте и поставете данните.

browserNotSupportClipboard.message: Четецът ви не поддържа копиране в буфера, затова го копирайте на ръка.

changeMasterPasswordConfirmation.message: You can change your master password on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

commandAutofillDesc.message: Автоматично попълване на последно използвания запис в текущия сайт.

commandGeneratePasswordDesc.message: Създаване и копиране на нова случайна парола в буфера.

customEnvironmentFooter.message: For advanced users. You can specify the base URL of each service independently.

datePasswordUpdated.description: ex. Date this password was updated

dateUpdated.description: ex. Date this item was updated

defaultMatchDetection.description: Default URI match detection for auto-fill.

deleteAttachmentConfirmation.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете прикачения файл?

deleteFolderConfirmation.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете тази папка?

deleteItemConfirmation.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете елемента?

disableAutoTotpCopyDesc.message: If your login has an authenticator key attached to it, the TOTP verification code is automatically copied to your clipboard whenever you auto-fill the login.

disableChangedPasswordNotificationDesc.message: The "Changed Password Notification" automatically prompts you to update a login's password in your vault whenever it detects that you have changed it on a website.

disableContextMenuItemDesc.message: Context menu options provide quick access to password generation and logins for the website in your current tab.

disableFaviconDesc.message: Иконките на сайтовете са разпознаваемо изображение за всеки запис в трезора.

duoDesc.description: 'Duo Security' and 'Duo Mobile' are product names and should not be translated.
duoDesc.message: Verify with Duo Security using the Duo Mobile app, SMS, phone call, or U2F security key.

duoOrganizationDesc.description: 'Duo Security' and 'Duo Mobile' are product names and should not be translated.
duoOrganizationDesc.message: Verify with Duo Security for your organization using the Duo Mobile app, SMS, phone call, or U2F security key.

emailDesc.message: Verification codes will be emailed to you.

enableAutoFillOnPageLoadDesc.message: If a login form is detected, automatically perform an auto-fill when the web page loads.

enterEmailToGetHint.message: Въведете електронната си поща, за да получите подсказка за главната парола.

enterVerificationCodeApp.message: Въведете шест-цифреният код за потвърждение от приложението за удостоверяване.

enterVerificationCodeEmail.message: Въведете шест-цифреният код за потвърждение, който е бил изпратен на $EMAIL$.

environmentSaved.message: The environment URLs have been saved.

experimentalFeature.message: This is currently an experimental feature. Use at your own risk.

exportMasterPassword.message: Enter your master password to export your vault data.

exportWarning.message: This export contains your unencrypted data in .csv format. You should not store or send it over unsecure channels (such as email). Delete it immediately after your are done using it.

extDesc.message: Безопасно и безплатно управление за всички ваши устройства.

gaDesc.message: We use analytics to better learn how the extension is being used so that we can make it better. All data collection is completely anonymous.

gettingStartedTutorialVideo.message: Watch our getting started tutorial to learn how to get the most out of the browser extension.

host.description: A URL's host value. For example, the host of https://sub.domain.com:443 is 'sub.domain.com:443'.

insertU2f.message: Insert your security key into your computer's USB port. If it has a button, touch it.

insertYubiKey.message: Insert your YubiKey into your computer's USB port, then touch its button.

logOutConfirmation.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да се отпишете?

loginOrCreateNewAccount.message: Впишете се или създайте нов сметка, за да получите достъп безопасен трезор.

masterPassDesc.message: Главната парола се използва за достъп до трезора ви. Запомнете я добре, защото възстановяването й не е възможно.

masterPassDoesntMatch.message: Потвърждаването на главната парола не отговаря.

masterPassHintDesc.message: Ако сте забравили главната парола, то подсказването може да ви помогне да си я припомните.

masterPassLength.message: Главната парола трябва да съдържа поне 8 знака.

masterPassSent.message: Изпратили сме ви ел. писмо с подсказка за главната ви парола.

maxFileSize.message: Големината на файла да е най-много 100 МБ.

neverLockWarning.message: Are you sure you want to use the "Never" option? Setting your lock options to "Never" stores your vault's encryption key on your device. If you use this option you should ensure that you keep your device properly protected.

newAccountCreated.message: Вашата сметка беше създадена. Вече можете да се впишете.

noTwoStepProviders.message: This account has two-step login enabled, however, none of the configured two-step providers are supported by this web browser.

noTwoStepProviders2.message: Please use a supported web browser (such as Chrome) and/or add additional providers that are better supported across web browsers (such as an authenticator app).

noneFolder.description: This is the folder for uncategorized items

notificationAddDesc.message: Искате ли тази парола да бъде запазена?

notificationChangeDesc.message: Do you want to update this password in Bitwarden?

organization.description: An entity of multiple related people (ex. a team or business organization).

overwritePasswordConfirmation.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да презапишете текущата парола?

passGenInfo.message: Автоматично създаване на силни и неповторими пароли.

passwordExposed.message: Паролата е била разкрита $VALUE$ път/и в пробиви. Непременно я сменете.

passwordSafe.message: Паролата не е била разкрита в известните пробиви. Можете да продължите да я използвате.

popup2faCloseMessage.message: Clicking outside the popup window to check your email for your verification code will cause this popup to close. Do you want to open this popup in a new window so that it does not close?

ppremiumSignUpFuture.message: All future premium features. More coming soon!

ppremiumSignUpTotp.message: TOTP verification code (2FA) generator for logins in your vault.

ppremiumSignUpTwoStep.message: Additional two-step login options such as YubiKey, FIDO U2F, and Duo.

premiumCurrentMemberThanks.message: Благодарим ви за подкрепата на програмата.

premiumManageAlert.message: You can manage your membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

premiumPurchaseAlert.message: You can purchase premium membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

premiumRequiredDesc.message: A premium membership is required to use this feature.

premiumSignUpAndGet.message: Абонирайте се за премийно членство и получете:

privateModeMessage.message: Unfortunately this window is not available in private mode for this browser.

rateExtensionDesc.message: Моля, помогнете ни, като оставите положителен отзив!

recoveryCodeDesc.message: Lost access to all of your two-factor providers? Use your recovery code to disable all two-factor providers from your account.

regEx.description: A programming term, also known as 'RegEx'.

selfHostedEnvironmentFooter.message: Specify the base URL of your on-premise hosted Bitwarden installation.

sendVerificationCodeEmailAgain.message: Повторно изпращане на писмото за потвърждение

shareVaultConfirmation.message: Bitwarden allows you to share your vault with others by using an organization account. Would you like to visit the bitwarden.com website to learn more?

themeDesc.message: Промяна на цветовия облик на програмата.

twoStepLoginConfirmation.message: Two-step login makes your account more secure by requiring you to verify your login with another device such as a security key, authenticator app, SMS, phone call, or email. Two-step login can be enabled on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

twoStepNewWindowMessage.message: Завършете двустепенното удостоверяване в новия раздел.

u2fDesc.message: Use any FIDO U2F enabled security key to access your account.

updateKey.message: Не можете да използвате функцията, докато не обновите шифровъчния си ключ.

uriPosition.description: A listing of URIs. Ex: URI 1, URI 2, URI 3, etc.

useAnotherTwoStepMethod.message: Използвайте друг начин на двустепенно удостоверяване

valueCopied.description: Value has been copied to the clipboard.

verificationCodeEmailSent.message: Писмото за потвърждение е изпратено на $EMAIL$.

warning.description: WARNING (should stay in capitalized letters if the language permits)

webVaultUrl.message: Адрес на сървъра за интернетния трезор

yubiKeyDesc.message: Use a YubiKey to access your account. Works with YubiKey 4, 4 Nano, 4C, and NEO devices.
